REGULATION_NAME_EN_STRING: English name must be a string.
REGULATION_NAME_AR_STRING: Arabic name must be a string.
LEVELS_RANGE_INVALID: Levels should be from 1 to levelsCount.
LEVEL_REQ_HOURS_INVALID: Level {{current}} reqHours ({{currentHours}}) must be greater than level {{previous}} reqHours ({{previousHours}}).
COURSE_GPA_RANGE_INVALID: Course GPA ranges must cover all numbers from 0 to 100 without gaps or overlaps.
CUM_GPA_RANGE_INVALID: Cumulative GPA ranges must cover all numbers from 0 to 4 without gaps or overlaps.
REGULATION_LEVEL_VALUE_INT: Level value must be an integer.
REGULATION_LEVEL_VALUE_MIN: Level value must be at least 1.
REGULATION_LEVEL_REQ_HOURS_INT: Required hours must be an integer.
REGULATION_LEVEL_REQ_HOURS_MIN: Required hours must be at least 0.
REGULATION_COURSE_GPA_FROM_INT: Course GPA 'from' must be an integer.
REGULATION_COURSE_GPA_FROM_MIN: Course GPA 'from' must be at least 0.
REGULATION_COURSE_GPA_TO_INT: Course GPA 'to' must be an integer.
REGULATION_COURSE_GPA_TO_MAX: Course GPA 'to' must be at most 100.
REGULATION_COURSE_GPA_GPA_NUMBER: Course GPA value must be a number.
REGULATION_COURSE_GPA_GPA_MIN: Course GPA value must be at least 0.
REGULATION_COURSE_GPA_NAME_STRING: Course GPA name must be a string.
REGULATION_CUM_GPA_FROM_NUMBER: Cumulative GPA 'from' must be a number.
REGULATION_CUM_GPA_FROM_MIN: Cumulative GPA 'from' must be at least 0.
REGULATION_CUM_GPA_TO_NUMBER: Cumulative GPA 'to' must be a number.
REGULATION_CUM_GPA_TO_MAX: Cumulative GPA 'to' must be at most 4.
REGULATION_CUM_GPA_NAME_STRING: Cumulative GPA name must be a string.
REGULATION_REG_RULES_MAX_REG_HOURS_INT: Max registration hours must be an integer.
REGULATION_REG_RULES_MAX_REG_HOURS_MIN: Max registration hours must be at least 1.
REGULATION_REG_RULES_NORMAL_REG_HOURS_IN: Normal registration hours must be an integer.
REGULATION_REG_RULES_NORMAL_REG_HOURS_MI: Normal registration hours must be at least 1.
REGULATION_REG_RULES_MIN_REG_HOURS_INT: Min registration hours must be an integer.
REGULATION_REG_RULES_MIN_REG_HOURS_MIN: Min registration hours must be at least 1.
REGULATION_REG_RULES_GPA_FOR_MAX_HOURS_N: GPA for max hours must be a number.
REGULATION_REG_RULES_GPA_FOR_MAX_HOURS_M: GPA for max hours must be at least 0.
GPA for max hours must be at most 4.
REGULATION_REG_RULES_SUMMER_TERM_HOURS_I: Summer term hours must be an integer.
REGULATION_REG_RULES_SUMMER_TERM_HOURS_M: Summer term hours must be at least 1.
REGULATION_DISMISSAL_MAX_CONSEC_WARNINGS: Max consecutive warnings must be an integer.
Max consecutive warnings must be at least 1.
REGULATION_DISMISSAL_MAX_YEARS_LEVEL_ONE: Max years at level one must be an integer.
Max years at level one must be at least 1.
REGULATION_DISMISSAL_MIN_GPA_FOR_GRAD_NU: Min GPA for graduation must be a number.
REGULATION_DISMISSAL_MIN_GPA_FOR_GRAD_MI: Min GPA for graduation must be at least 0.
REGULATION_DISMISSAL_MIN_GPA_FOR_GRAD_MA: Min GPA for graduation must be at most 4.
REGULATION_RETAKE_MAX_RETAKE_GRADE_INT: Max retake grade must be an integer.
REGULATION_RETAKE_MAX_RETAKE_GRADE_MIN: Max retake grade must be at least 0.
REGULATION_RETAKE_MAX_RETAKE_GRADE_MAX: Max retake grade must be at most 100.
REGULATION_RETAKE_MAX_RETAKE_COURSES_INT: Max retake courses must be an integer.
REGULATION_RETAKE_MAX_RETAKE_COURSES_MIN: Max retake courses must be at least 0.
REGULATION_ACAD_REQ_REG_HOURS_INT: Regulation hours must be an integer.
REGULATION_ACAD_REQ_REG_HOURS_MIN: Regulation hours must be at least 1.
REGULATION_ACAD_REQ_LEVELS_COUNT_INT: Levels count must be an integer.
REGULATION_ACAD_REQ_LEVELS_COUNT_MIN: Levels count must be at least 1.
REGULATION_ACAD_REQ_SEMESTERS_WITHOUT_GP: Semesters without GPA rules must be an integer.
